sentence.Network_en: Mioga ginger , Zingiberaceae, contains much cellulose that stimulates the movement of enteric and helps the digestion.
sentence.Network_cn: 荷,亦称阳藿, 含纤维素 、 半纤维素较多,我国南部和日本有分布.

sentence.Network_en: Zingiberaceae plants are highly diverse in species, morphology and anatomic structure as well as in pollination.
sentence.Network_cn: 姜科植物在种类 、 外部件状及内部解剖等方面具有高度的复杂性,其传粉方式也显示出了丰富的多样性.
